name: My Sister Disappeared In A Dungeon, So I Became A JRPG Hero
name_original: My Sister Disappeared In A Dungeon, So I Became A JRPG Hero
description:
My Sister Disappeared In A Dungeon, So I Became A JRPG Hero  is a short game about a brother saving his sister after she gets trapped within a dungeon.

--------------

[Controls]

WASD to navigate menus & walk

Enter to select

Spacebar to attack

--------------

This game was created with the free version of Construct 3 using 50 events!

Art/Music: Nicolas Bellomo

Programming: Tim Chuang & Justin Santiago
